# TagsAndPagesBase.Tags property

Get the observable collection of tags.

```csharp
public ObservableDictionary<string, TagPageSet> Tags { get; }
```

## Remarks

The collection of tags is typically generated from page tags passed into [`UpdateTagSet`](./UpdateTagSet.md)
